column3: was a [[Númenor|Númenórean]] linear measure. The ''Ranga'' was said to be a full stride from the rear heel to the front toe
column4: by a full-grown Númenórean man in quick march. It was slightly longer than a yard

column2: when the stature of the [[Númenóreans]] decreased
column3: two ''Rangar'' was called "man-high" (suggesting that the average [[Dúnedain|Dúnadan]] was 6'4" or thereabouts). One ''Ranga'' was also the average height of a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] (hence the name [[halflings|''half''ling]] by the Dúnedain).<ref>{{UT|Linear}}</ref>
